mapper.select: select review_number ,title ,author ,content ,term ,regdate ,image_name ,readcnt from review where review_number = #{review_number}
mapper.update: update review set readcnt = NVL(readcnt, 0) + 1 where review_number = #{review_number}
mapper.select: select review.review_number as review_review_number , review.regdate as review_regdate , review.title as review_title , review.author as review_author ,review.readcnt as review_readcnt , review.content as review_content ,review_comment.author as review_comment_author , review_comment.content as review_comment_content from review, review_comment where review.review_number = review_comment.review_number and review.review_number = #{review_number}
